meanings.sent1: She quickly jotted down a croquis of her idea before it faded from memory.
meanings.sent2: The artist's croquis captured the essence of the landscape in just a few lines.
meanings.sent3: The croquis of the monster looked more like a friendly blob than a fearsome creature.
meanings.sent4: His croquis of the city skyline was like a snapshot frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The croquis of the flower was so detailed, it almost looked real.

meanings.sent1: He sketched a croquis of the building to show the basic structure.
meanings.sent2: The croquis of the story helped the author organize her thoughts before writing.
meanings.sent3: The croquis of the cake was just a simple circle with candles on top.
meanings.sent4: Her croquis of the dance routine was like a roadmap for the performers.
meanings.sent5: The croquis of the map highlighted the main roads and landmarks.

meanings.sent1: The architect presented a croquis of the new building to get feedback before starting the detailed plans.
meanings.sent2: The croquis of the garden layout showed where each plant would be placed.
meanings.sent3: The croquis of the party decorations looked more like a child's doodle than a professional design.
meanings.sent4: Her croquis of the outfit was like a blueprint for the final dress.
meanings.sent5: The croquis of the menu outlined the dishes to be served at the event.
